H0.text: who discovered the atom and in what year. Democritus

H1.text: who discovered the atom and in what year. Epicurus

H2.text: who discovered the atom and in what year. Antoine Lavoisier

H3.text: who discovered the atom and in what year. John Dalton

A4.text: Dalton developed the chemical atomic theory in 1803 to reconcile Henry Cavendish's and Antoine Lavoisier's analytical data on the composition of nitric acid

A5.text: Dalton's priority for the innovation of calculating relative atomic weights is uncontested
